view.sprites

Class EntitySprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.sprites.EntitySprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoundsListener, java.io.Serializable, Sprite

    public class EntitySprite
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sprite, BoundsListener, java.io.Serializable
    Connects Sprites to Entities
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
